docs.snippet: ZURICH, Oct. 5 -- Since Sept. 19 the Swiss National Bank has been obliged to intervene frequently to keep the dollar-franc rate exchange in Zurich above the lower statutory gold point of 4.28. At the present official price of gold of $35 an ounce...
docs.lead_paragraph: ZURICH, Oct. 5 -- Since Sept. 19 the Swiss National Bank has been obliged to intervene frequently to keep the dollar-franc rate exchange in Zurich above the lower statutory gold point of 4.28. At the present official price of gold of $35 an ounce mean dollar parity in Switzerland is 4.3728 francs, the higher gold point being 4.46.
docs.abstract: Swiss buying of US securities off because of NYSE decline; dollar demand off; dollar yield on US and Canadian investments up

headline.main: DOLLAR SUPPORTED BY BANK IN ZURICH; Swiss National Forced to Step In to Keep Rate Above Lower Statutory Gold Point

docs.snippet: British sterling developed a firm undertone last week, moving from a low of $2.78 3/8 on Wednesday to close on Friday at $2.78 3/4, a gain of 1/4 cent over the preceding week.

docs.snippet: John M. Cabot, Ambassador to Pakistan, declared here yesterday that a responsible press and an alert public opinion afforded the best protection against misconceptions and propaganda attacks destructive of inter-American solidarity.
